blogs.title: Philippine Airlines Ad Design
blogs.intro: In this reverse engineer post, we will critique how the designer implemented design principles to create an ad for Philippine Airlines. I found the design on Pinterest posted by Your City Guide.

blogs.title: Magazine Spread Typography & Photography
blogs.intro: We will critique this magazine spread using the principles of typography and photography. Let us see how the designer used effective typography to communicate with the audience.

blogs.title: Advertisement Design Analysis
blogs.intro: The purpose of this reverse engineer post is to analyze the ad design above made by Majestic, a clothing brand.
